jobs.title: Technology Analyst

jobs.description:
Key Responsibilities:Data Collection and Management:


Gather and organize data from various internal and external sources.
Clean and validate data to ensure accuracy, completeness, and consistency.

Data Analysis:


Analyze large datasets to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
Perform statistical analysis, and generate reports and dashboards to support decision-making.
Use tools such as SQL, Excel, Python, R, and business intelligence (BI) tools like Tableau or Power BI to analyze and visualize data.

Reporting and Visualization:


Prepare detailed reports and presentations for management and stakeholders.
Create easy-to-understand visualizations that present data insights clearly.
Ensure data-driven decisions by translating complex data into actionable insights.

Collaboration with Teams:


Work with business teams to understand their data needs and provide solutions.
Collaborate with IT and software developers to improve data collection processes.
Provide recommendations based on data trends for business improvement.

Database Maintenance:


Maintain and update databases, ensuring that data is accurate and secure.
Assist in automating data collection processes.

Business Problem Solving:


Identify business problems and provide solutions based on data.
Develop strategies to optimize processes and outcomes.
Required Skills:Technical Skills:

Proficiency in SQL and relational databases.
Expertise in data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, etc.).
Strong analytical skills, including proficiency in Excel, Python, or R for data manipulation and analysis.
Knowledge of statistical methods and analysis techniques.
Familiarity with data warehousing, data modeling, and ETL processes is a plus.
Soft Skills:

Strong problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication skills for sharing insights with technical and non-technical audiences.
Attention to detail and a strong focus on accuracy.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
jobs.title: Data Analyst

jobs.description:
We are looking for a senior data engineer for a reputed IT firm at chennai. 

Good experience in data engineering

Good Understanding of Cloud Platform like GCP (VPC, GCS, Stackdriver, Apigee), AWS

(S3, Cloud Watch).

Good Understanding of IAAC – Terraform, Gitlab

Strong knowledge of Java 7+, Spring Boot, Maven, Junits to build sustainable, reusable API’so n microservices patterns

Good Understanding of Products like Airflow (Python Based), Snowflake (Data

warehouse). Should be able to create pipelines in snowflake and have good understanding of

ETL (SQL Based) process and optimisations.

Data Pipeline Development: Design, develop, and optimize data pipelines and ETL processes to support data integration from multiple sources into a centralized data warehouse or data lake.
Data Architecture & Infrastructure: Build and maintain scalable, reliable, and high-

performance data architectures; drive data modeling, schema design, and optimization of data storage.

Data Quality & Governance: Implement data quality checks, validation frameworks, and data governance policies to ensure data accuracy, consistency, and reliability.

Performance Optimization: Analyze and improve data system performance to handle large-scale, high-velocity data streams.

Collaboration & Stakeholder Engagement: Collaborate closely with data analysts, data

scientists, and business stakeholders to understand data needs, provide technical expertise, andb enable data driven solutions.

Documentation & Best Practices: Create documentation, establish best practices, and

conduct code reviews to uphold data engineering standards and support team growth.
jobs.title: Senior Data Engineer

jobs.description:
The Role

In this role, you will play a pivotal part by:

Advanced Technical Expertise and Data Visualization:
 Demonstrating advanced proficiency in Tableau, including advanced data modeling, calculations using Tableau calculated fields, and data blending.
 Leading the design and development of complex dashboards and data visualizations using Tableau ,ensuring comprehensive and insightful representation of data.

Sophisticated Data Analysis and Manipulation:
 Employing advanced statistical methods and predictive analytics techniques within the Tableau environment to derive in-depth insights and identify complex trends.
Strategic Collaboration and Communication:
 Collaborating with senior stakeholders and cross-functional teams to translate complex business requirements into advanced Tableau solutions and effectively communicate data-driven insights.

Continuous Advancement:
 Pioneering the enhancement and optimization of advanced data analysis methods and techniques within the Tableau framework, setting new industry benchmarks.
Requirements: To excel in this role, we seek candidates with the following qualifications:

 A Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (Preferably B Tech or MBA).
 5 to 7 years of experience, with a minimum of 4 years in Tableau.
 Value-added experience in MS/Oracle SQL.
 Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
 A high degree of integrity and ethics.
 Self-driven and results-oriented.

About the Department: The People Reporting & Analytics department, based in POGBS, comprises a team of dedicated professionals focused on establishing and maintaining global dashboards for people and organization. We work collaboratively to support the global People Analytics vision, operating in a fast-paced and dynamic atmosphere where continuous improvement and delivering impactful insights are at the core of our work.

jobs.description:
Data Analyst

Purpose

The role of ‘Operations Analyst’ (Their main duties include reviewing company data, building reports based on these findings ) is multi-faceted role encompassing components of data analysis, reporting, process documentation and other ad hoc administrative tasks . The role will be focused on supporting the Operations, Sales & Marketing functions of the business.

The core purpose of the role is to ensure iD4me instantly has a reliable dataset on which to depend for reporting and subsequent decision-making, as well as documenting all processes in a clear, detailed and consistent manner.

Core responsibilities

o Data Quality – including the monitoring & reporting on operation of all internal system integrations

o Reporting – Production of all reporting relating to Operations, Sales & Marketing

o Process Documentation – All process documentation relating to operations and sales processes

Detailed Responsibilities

Reporting & Documentation

o Lead initiative to design, collect and standardise all process documentation for Operations functions

o Responsible for all Exec, Sales & Operational reporting (including churn analysis, conversion rates, lead source effectiveness etc)

o Collate iD4me Performance reporting

o iD4me performance trend analysis

o iD4me Customer usage tracking

o Assist Head of Operations coordinating accurate and timely reporting on the various functions of operations, including the weekly SOW pack

Data Quality

o Work closely with the CRM Manager and other relevant stakeholders to ensure internal system integrations are optimised and working as expected

o Conduct regular reviews, in conjunction with CRM Manager, to ensure data quality of CRM is maintained and aligned with other core systems (iD4Me, Auth0, Stripe, Paypal etc)

Marketing Reporting & Analysis

o Track & report on EDM performance

Successful candidates must have:
Good experience with Data Analytics
Data Mining
ERP
Supply chain and logistics
Production and Operations management
Python\ SPSS for data analysis
Data Warehouse
Advance Statistics
Operation Research
Machine learning
Bayesian Classifier
Neural network
Strong English communication skills, both written and verbal
Previous experience in a customer facing support or similar position is highly advantageous
Experience and or exposure to using HubSpot or a similar CRM tool
Intermediate (or better) excel skills
Previous experience in reporting and/or data analysis
Experience working in tableau / power BI highly regarded
Ability to multi-task and work under pressure
Able to work within and contribute to a team environment
Willingness to work onsite
Flexibility to take on ad hoc tasks and learn as you go
Experience of working with data and knowledge of appropriate handling of sensitive information relating to individuals is highly advantageous
Experience of working in the Real Estate or Property sectors is highly advantageous


Shift - 5am to 2pm/6am to 3pm (Pickup available in and around Kolkata)

Salary- Upto 60000

For interview contact- HR DIKSHA (7603072343)
jobs.title: Data Analyst

jobs.description:
MERN Stack Faculty

Job Title: MERN Stack Faculty

Department: Computer Science/Information Technology

Reports to: Department Head

Job Summary:

Teach and develop curriculum for undergraduate/graduate programs focusing on MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js), conduct research, and contribute to departmental service.

Key Responsibilities:

- Teach MERN Stack courses
- Develop and update curriculum
- Mentor students in projects and research
- Conduct research in MERN Stack-related areas
- Publish research papers
- Departmental committee service

Requirements:

- Master's/Ph.D. in Computer Science or related field
- Teaching experience
- Strong programming skills in JavaScript, Node.js, React.js, and MongoDB
- Research publication record
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Data Analyst Faculty

Job Title: Data Analyst Faculty

Department: Business/Computer Science

Reports to: Department Head

Job Summary:

Teach and develop curriculum for undergraduate/graduate programs focusing on data analysis, conduct research, and contribute to departmental service.

Key Responsibilities:

- Teach data analysis courses (e.g., statistics, data visualization)
- Develop and update curriculum
- Mentor students in projects and research
- Conduct research in data analysis-related areas
- Publish research papers
- Departmental committee service

Requirements:

- Master's/Ph.D. in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
- Teaching experience
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau, Power BI)
- Research publication record
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Digital Marketing Faculty

Job Title: Digital Marketing Faculty

Department: Business/Marketing

Reports to: Department Head

Job Summary:

Teach and develop curriculum for undergraduate/graduate programs focusing on digital marketing, conduct research, and contribute to departmental service.

Key Responsibilities:

- Teach digital marketing courses (e.g., social media, SEO, PPC)
- Develop and update curriculum
- Mentor students in projects and research
- Conduct research in digital marketing-related areas
- Publish research papers
- Departmental committee service

Requirements:

- Master's/Ph.D. in Marketing or related field
- Teaching experience
- Strong knowledge of digital marketing platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, Facebook Ads)
- Research publication record
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Common Requirements:

- Strong communication and interpersonal skills
- Ability to work in a team environment
- Commitment to diversity and inclusion

jobs.description:
Role & responsibilities

Collect and organize data from different sources for analysis.
Build data models that meet business needs.
Gather data from databases, spreadsheets, and external sources.
Create interactive dashboards and reports using Power BI.
Develop visual tools like KPI scorecards to track performance.
Analyse data to find trends, patterns, and insights.
Ensure all data is accurate and reliable in the Power BI systems.
Work closely with the transportation team to understand their data needs and turn business requirements into technical solutions.
Regularly update and maintain the existing Power BI reports and dashboards to ensure they run smoothly.
Process Automation: Using tools like Power Automate to automate repetitive tasks and workflows
Provide actionable insights to improve transportation operations.


Preferred candidate profile

Bachelors degree in a related field (e.g., Data Science, MSC Computer Science, MCA, BSC Computer Science, BCA)
Experience with Power BI and data analysis.
Knowledge of SQL, and Power Automate.
Familiarity with Data Cleaning, Data Visualization, Data Transformation
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Good communication skills and attention to detail.
Road transportation or logistics Knowledge is a plus.


Perks and benefits

Perks and benefits Competitive salary group health insurance participation in team incentive programs after completion of the probation period growth opportunities

Job Title: Senior Business Analyst (Female)
Location: Lal Kothi , Jaipur
Department: Business Analysis
Job Summary:We are seeking an experienced female Senior Business Analyst to lead our business analysis initiatives. This role involves understanding business needs, identifying improvement areas, and providing insights for strategic decisions. The ideal candidate has strong analytical and communication skills, with a proven track record of translating data into actionable business strategies.
Key Responsibilities:· Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze business requirements.
· Develop data-driven insights and reports to guide business decisions.
· Identify opportunities for process improvement and efficiency.
· Serve as a liaison between business and technology teams.
Qualifications:· Bachelor’s degree in Business, Economics, or a related field.
· 1+ years of experience in business analysis, with strong proficiency in Excel, SQL, or similar tools.
· Excellent communication and presentation skills.
